Star idols! You can conveniently access the communities of artists you are interested in.\nYou can also star idols on the \'My Idol\' menu. There is no limit to the number of artists you can add to the list.\n(My Idol: Heart Icon / Favorites: Star Icon)

Star Celebs! You can conveniently access the communities of celebs you are interested in.\nYou can also star the celebs on the \'My Celeb\' menu. There is no limit to the number of celebs you can add to the list.\n(My Celeb: Heart Icon / Favorites: Star Icon)

- This is the number of hearts you voted for your Idol. 
- Your grade and accumulated votes will be reset if you do not log in for a certain period of time.
(Everything will return when you log in and vote again.)
- You'll receive 100 hearts daily for launching the app, as well as bonus level reward hearts based on your level status!

- This is the number of hearts you voted for your Celeb. 
- Your level and accumulated votes will be reset if you do not log in for a certain period of time.
(Everything will return when you log in and vote again.)
- You'll receive 100 hearts daily for launching the app, as well as bonus level reward hearts based on your level status!
The 1st place in the accumulated score becomes the Charity Angel👼

This is the total of the scores obtained from the daily voting rankings in the last 30 days. It exposes the top 100.
If you click on each individual and group name, you can see the rank change graph.
We are making donations to meaningful places in the name of an idol and its fandom, which was ranked as the top accumulated number one in the 30-day rankings!

✅ Aggregation method
- Member: #1 accumulated score for the previous 30 days, including the 10th of each month (announced on the 11th)
- Group: #1 accumulated score for the previous 30 days, including the 15th of each month (announced on the 16th)
- Other categories: Separately notified when proceeding

✅ Reward
- Donation of 500,000 won to the Welfare Organizations in the Artist and the Fandom's name.
- Posting an Electronic Board Ad in Seoul Subway

Each league\'s members are determined according to the league change criteria on the 11th (Individual) and the 16th (Group).\nIf the league is changed, the Hall of Fame cumulative ranking score starts with 0 points.

-The league of individuals and groups is separate. (Even if the group is in League S, individuals can be in League A.)
- If a tie occurs, all ties will be assigned according to league allocation rules and will be reallocated to the existing number of teams or individuals the following month.
e.g.) If 3 teams get the same score in League A, 3 teams will move to League S (Changing the quota of League S to 13). Low-ranked three teams will be moved to League A the following month to keep 12 teams in League S.
- The newly added idols start in League A.
- The ranking history before the introduction of the league system in the Hall of Fame is marked as 'ALL'.

Same as the original rules of the CHOEAEDOL
◆ Rule different from the original rules
* Not individual and group, but male and female favorite group.
* Candidates are limited to the groups Gaon specify
* The number of votes to members of the group, on individual tap, is also added
* In-app payment is limited to one per day per device
* Restricts the following functions from 23:15 to 00:15(KST)

The rankings are based on accumulated scores that are combined and aggregated over the past 30 days from each fandom on Hall of Fame. Only top100 are displayed.
If you click on each fandom, corresponding change of ranking will be shown.
Donations will be made in the names of celebrities based on the accumulated rankings over the past 30 days!

✅ Achievement criteria
- Condition1 : an average of 3,000,000 votes or more over the past 30 days
- Condition2 : ranked 1st or 2nd in corresponding category on Hall of Fame on the 6th of the month
- Both conditions must be met to be selected as Charity Angel.

✅ Reward
- Category 1st place
(1)Donation of 500,000KRW to Miral Welfare Foundation
(2)Subway advertisement at Hongdae entrance station
(3)Full-page banner ad
(4)Menu sliding ad 
- Category 2nd place
(1)Donation of 500,000KRW to Miral Welfare Foundation
(2)Subway advertisement at Hongdae entrance station
(3)Full-page banner ad

You will spend %1$s diamonds to create support.\nThe diamonds used when creating a new support fundraising event are not refundable.
Date of the support event (Birthday, debut day etc.)
I have read and accepted the above policies.

Precautions
 - Once you set up a support event, it cannot be canceled.
 - The diamonds will be returned to your account automatically if the support event fundraising fails.
 - The diamonds used when creating a new support fundraising event are not refundable.
 - Fundraising must be completed 30 days before the anniversary starts.
 - Fundraising for the support event can be added 100 days before the anniversary.
 - If we don't receive any design during the fundraising period, we will hang the basic design ad.
 - Depending on the condition of the affiliates, the ad may not be hung.
 - The winning design will include a QR code image of CHOEAEDOL. This makes it difficult to cancel the ad or change the design.
 - The design of the support event can be changed after we hang the ad.
 - If the ad is sold out or canceled, the ad can be altered or refunded.
Support event has been created successfully.
Please select the anniversary date to hang your ad based on KST. (within 100 days)
Please select a month to hang the ad. (within 100 days)

Diamonds cannot be used for voting. Please purchase Hearts from the Store when voting for your idol on the Ranking.\nUsed diamonds are non-refundable.\nThe diamonds will be returned automatically as diamonds if the Support Event fundraising fails. Please refer to [Support - Important].

- Once you set up a support event, it cannot be canceled.
 - The diamonds will be returned to your account automatically if the support event fundraising fails.
 - The diamonds used when creating a new support fundraising event are not refundable.
 - Fundraising must be completed 30 days before the anniversary starts.
 - Fundraising for the support event can be added 100 days before the anniversary.
 - If we don't receive any design during the fundraising period, we will hang the basic design ad.
 - Depending on the condition of the affiliates, the ad may not be hung.
 - The winning design will include a QR code image of CHOEAEDOL. This makes it difficult to cancel the ad or change the design.
 - The design of the support event can be changed after we hang the ad.
 - If the ad is sold out or canceled, the ad can be altered or refunded.
Special events on the special days of your celeb~

[Customer Service Hours]
Weekdays 10:00 - 17:00(KST)
(Please note that inquiries outside of business hours will be answered sequentially during business hours)

- If you attach a screenshot to your inquiry, please be sure to capture the current time on the screenshot.
- The attached files will be automatically deleted after 30 days from the date of inquiry.
- If the content contains profanity, sexual harassment, or threatening language, you may be banned from posting, permanently suspended from your account, or taken action by applicable laws.
